attributes.title: Fellow Patriot
attributes.review: Great app.  One stop shop to keep you up to date on the latest campaign news and events.

attributes.title: Great app. Lots of info and updates
attributes.review: Very good at keeping you up to date with campaign news

attributes.title: Awesome
attributes.review: Love this!! Wonderful!! Easy to use. Lots of bells and whistles, and can find all his plans and stands on all issues in one easy to find place!!!

attributes.title: Bald Eagle Beacon
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and went outside the next day to find 50 Bald Eagles flying around. Trump will Make America Great Again... Greater than Ever Before!!!!

attributes.title: Surprisingly Useful App
attributes.review: A ton of information and features make this app surprisingly useful. Make America Great Again!

attributes.title: Trump 2016
attributes.review: Yes I am rating the app based on my endorsement of Trump... Don't like it? Oh well... Don't care about an app; I care about our country! Hillary is a murder, a liar, a thief, and a con-artist. Vote Trump | Save America.

attributes.title: Let's Make America Great Again!
attributes.review: I love this app, easy and  understandable. I'm so happy Donald and his team put it together, great idea. Keep up the great work Team Trump!

attributes.title: Absolutely Deplorable!!!
attributes.review:
At what point did we transition from working with the government, to working for the government? Our forefathers never intended on having people working FOR the government... rather, WITH the government FOR THE PEOPLE! 

*It's time to get back to what makes this country worth living in again! 
*It's time to put people first again!
*ITâ€™S TIME TO MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!!
*** #TRUMP2016 ***

attributes.title: MAGA!
attributes.review: Perfect to get all the up-to-date information around the campaign before entering the White House!
